title: Majestic Meat Company Recalls Ground Beef Products due to Possible E. coli O157:H7 Contamination
summary: WASHINGTON, Nov. 16, 2018 Majestic Meat Company, a Salt Lake City, Utah establishment, is recalling approximately 532 pounds of ground beef products that may be contaminated with E. coli O157:H7, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The bulk...
